verbs.description: ham - spinach crepe cups [V: using] [ARG1: ingredients you likely already have on hand] these savory crepes will add fun to your celebration for mere pennies plus by changing the filling to something sweet such as berries and whipped cream you can create a great dessert —kathi grenier auburn maine
